items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars For Wicked Women ðŸ˜‚â¤ï¸
items.body: Its wicked ! Just got this and Iâ€™m already wearing it LOL after spraying The Laundress Wool & Cashmere Spray on it! (I use their products to hand wash my cashmeres also) I love this soft and creamy cashmere sweater! ðŸ¥° Itâ€™s a little on the thinner side compared to other NAADAM sweaters that I own. So itâ€™s not hot, I tend to run a little on the warm side. Itâ€™s lightweight and somewhat sheer. Also, know that cashmere does not need to be very thick to keep a person warm . Its does have a little give to it which is normal but I always make sure it â€œsnaps backâ€ into place without obvious sagging before buying cashmere. Itâ€™s likely 2-ply cashmere. The embroidery is really pretty and well made. I ordered 3 total of these but I think this one is my favorite because sometimes with all the holiday commotions, I feel overwhelmed and cranky LOL basically, I feel Wicked. Love the softness and coziness of my new cashmere Wicked sweater and I love NAADAM BRAND . I have been buying NAADAM cashmere sweaters and other garments since the company first started selling at a fine, upscale dept store ( which has recently 2025 joined Amazon on the Luxury side) PS I have 3 different styles of the Wicked cashmere sweaters so I included the photos in this review bc Amazon wonâ€™t allow me to review each on separately! Lovely sweater for Wicked or Nadaam fans! Read more
items.author: Shoppher on the Fly!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Strange Cut and Fit, Scratchy Yarn
items.body: I love NAADAM as a brand and have several of their cashmere sweaters. I was super excited to receive this sweater, but when it arrived, I was really disappointed. The texture was scratchy and not dreamy soft like their usual cashmere sweaters. The sizing seemed a little bit smaller than their other sweaters. The sweater oddly gets tight at the bottom, but also bulges out above that, which is weird and unflattering. I have not noticed any pilling yet, but I have also only worn it once because of its scratchiness and unflattering fit. I normally think NAADAM offers great values, but not with this sweater. I think it is overpriced and not great quality. I do not recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Maureen R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it so much!
items.body: This is a really amazing sweater! We love Wicked in this house. And while itâ€™s more of a subtle nod, itâ€™s perfect. Itâ€™s made incredibly well. The fabric is so soft, with the perfect amount of stretch. It is not heavy, nor bulky. The fit is true to size. The style is iconic. Will be able to wear it for years to come. Beautiful soft green color. The embroidery of the hat and broom is done very nicely. All around an amazing quality sweater. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect. order up for loungy comfy cozy goodness
items.body: Wow, I really like this sweater. The green is awesome with my skin and makes my green eyes pop. Kinda witchy too. Totally fun. The fabric is luxe and not too heavy or too thin it's great for winter wear with a tank top and that's all I need for most any situation around the house, and unless it's freezing it works great with just a scarf running errands. Love the embroidered hat and broomstick which is nicely themed but not overly obvious so can be worn for multiple occasions style wise. I ordered the XXL for a baggy fit and that's what it gave me. It's gonna be my favorite comfy thing this winter. I'm 190lbs and 5'8 for reference. I probably could have ordered a XL, or a L even for a more fitted look as I have one other Naadam in L and it works too, but like I said I just wanted this one baggy like and tis perfect. Would make an excellent holiday gift. Read more
items.author: a human being

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Changed for Good, Wicked, Defying Gravity, Elphaba, Wicked Glinda's Charm, Slippers, Yellow Brick Road, I Feel Wicked, The Girl in Bubble, Wicked for Good. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
